Regional Director, Strategic Business Practices - Deal Strategy & Pricing
scraped_data.bio:
Regional Director | Strategy & Growth Leader Across Tech, Automotive & CPG | Building Scalable GTM & Monetization Models | Board Advisory with Execution Depth
I’m a strategic business leader with a passion for building what doesn’t yet exist - new strategies, new markets, new ways of working - and turning them into measurable outcomes. My experience spans technology, consumer goods, automotive, and manufacturing, and I’ve led regional and global teams through complex transformations, growth initiatives, and operational reinvention.

What defines my path is not just advising on strategy, but owning it, leading from within, with full accountability for results. I’ve run business units, shaped go-to-market models, built pricing and monetization frameworks, and improved commercial governance to help companies grow smarter and scale sustainably.

Today at Salesforce, I lead Strategic Business Practices for the Americas. My focus is on enabling scalable, high-impact deal strategy across fast-paced, high-growth markets. I work closely with sales, finance, legal, and operations to make complex deals simpler, faster, and more profitable and to ensure our pricing models and governance structures support long-term value, not just short-term wins.

Throughout my career, I’ve helped global organizations unlock margin, expand regionally, and lead cross-functional transformations. I know how to navigate ambiguity, build alignment across diverse stakeholders, and turn competing interests into common purpose. Whether in boardrooms, frontline operations, or cross-border initiatives, I’m drawn to complexity and to making it actionable.

But beyond strategy and execution, I care deeply about how we lead. As a woman who has thrived in industries and environments that weren’t always designed to support equity, I understand the cost of success when cultures are misaligned. That’s why I work to create healthier leadership models, ones that allow women to grow without burning out, and where diversity is not just welcomed, but recognized as essential to performance. Through my advisory work with the Women Economic Forum, I help elevate diverse voices in leadership and push for the cultural shifts that organizations need to stay relevant and human.

I believe in business as a platform to create both value and change and I’m always open to connecting with others who share that mindset.

Let’s talk if you’re building something bold, evolving how your company sells or operates, or just looking to bring more clarity to complexity.

scraped_data.bio:
Marketing Automation Consultant | Salesforce Marketing Cloud | Marketing Digital | Análisis de datos | Customer Experience |
👋 ¡Hola! Soy Daniel Carmona Martínez, un apasionado del marketing digital, siempre en la búsqueda de nuevas oportunidades para crecer y aprender. Acabo de terminar de cursar un máster en Marketing Digital en la Universidad Complutense de Madrid y estoy buscando comenzar mi trayectoria en el mundo laboral. Mi enfoque principal radica en aplicar los principios sociológicos al ámbito digital, lo que me permite identificar oportunidades emergentes a partir de fenómenos sociales y transformarlas en estrategias efectivas.

💡 Tengo un perfil funcional y analítico, con alta experiencia en herramientas del Marketing digital como Google Analytics, creación de páginas web, diseños web, optimización de conversiones (CRO), SEO, CRM, gestión de RRSS etc. He tenido la oportunidad de participar en proyectos clave como la optimización SEO de la tienda online de Joan Pradells y la creación de una estrategia integral de marketing para La Villana, maximizando su visibilidad y alcance digital.(https://vm.tiktok.com/ZGeE7hAc1/)

📊 Soy una persona curiosa y polifacética, por ello comencé a formarme también en herramientas específicas del análisis de datos como Python, Rstudio, SPSS y Excel, en la cual tengo un nivel alto de manejo. Me encanta explorar nuevos campos y estoy siempre abierto a asumir nuevos retos que me permitan expandir mis horizontes y conocimientos.

✅Además de mi perfil analítico y estratégico, cuento con grandes capacidades para moverme y adaptarme en distintos contextos sociales gracias a haber trabajado en varios servicios de cara al público como el SAMUR SOCIAL.

🎯 Mi objetivo es seguir creciendo a nivel profesional y sobre todo en el Marketing digital, aplicando mis habilidades y conocimientos para ayudar a empresas a destacar en el entorno digital. Pero siempre estaré abierto a descubrir nuevas experiencias profesionales más allá del Marketing. Si buscas a alguien con pasión por la tecnología, la estrategia digital y el análisis de tendencias sociales, ¡hablemos!
